description: The file implements core functions of an HTTP message parser component, including creation, initialization, object enrollment, and removal of the parser object. It defines a constructor, destructor, and setup routines for the parser component, including handling of internal interfaces and data structures.

classes.name: HTTP_SIMPLE_MSG_PARSER
classes.description: Main data structure representing the HTTP message parser component, including function pointers and internal data.

classes.name: HTTP_HFP_INTERFACE
classes.description: Interface structure containing function pointers for HTTP header/frame parsing functions, used by the parser component.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE HttpSmpoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and initializes a new HTTP simple message parser object, setting up its basic properties and interface.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSmpoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Cleans up and destroys the parser object, freeing associated resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSmpoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls required subordinate objects or interfaces into the parser object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS HttpSmpoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Performs the initialization of the parser object, including setting function pointers and creating interface structures.
